S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.1_1: mahatāṃ maṇivimalānāṃ api bhavati na rāgasaṃkrāntiḥ //
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.2_0: śākyālaye darśanam eva pitrā sarvānukampī bhṛśam arthyamānaḥ
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.3_1: kāntyā diśāṃ vismayam ullikhantaṃ yaśodharā taṃ dayitaṃ vilokya //
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.4_1: dhṛtiṃ vayasyām iva vārayantīṃ nirasya saudhāt tanum utsasarja //
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.5_0: yadā yadā pallavapeśalāṅgī dehaṃ samutsṛṣṭavatī satī sā /
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.5_1: tadā tadā manmathamohitāṃ tāṃ dayārdracakṣur bhagavān rarakṣa //
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.6_0: tataḥ kadā cid bhagavān vanānte tatkautukād bhikṣugaṇena pṛṣṭaḥ /
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.7_0: yaśodharā madviraheṇa nityaṃ karoti yat sāhasam etad ārtā /
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.7_1: haranti dhairyaṃ vitaranti mohaṃ eṣa svabhāvaḥ smaravibhramāṇāṃ //
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.8_0: mayāpi tasyā viraheṇa pūrvaṃ janmāntare māravimohitena /
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.10_1: lakṣmīḥ prasādhitā yena kīrtir eva pravāsitā //
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.23_0: apatyam iva rāṣṭraṃ yaḥ sadā paśyati bhūpatiḥ /
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.24_0: iti niścayam ādhāya yayus te hastināpuraṃ /
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.24_1: tyājyaḥ kāyo 'pi sāpāyaḥ kiṃ punar deśasaṃśrayaḥ //
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.26_0: sa siddhāṃ ghṛtapākena sudhāṃ pītvā mahauṣadhim /
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.27_0: durbhikṣakhinnā yadi te yātā mama ripoḥ puram /
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.27_1: tat sarvatra bhavanty eva paryāyair devaviplavāḥ //
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.28_0: atha vā rājadoṣena gatās te sukhavāñchayā /
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.29_1: dūrastha eva sarvasya sarvo bhavati vallabhaḥ //
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.30_1: pareṣāṃ harate yena mugdhā jāyā iva prajāḥ //
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.35_0: tasmād vidyābalān nāgaḥ sa hartuṃ yadi śakyate /
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.35_1: tadā yānti svayaṃ tasya prajās tvām eva saṃśrayam //
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.36_0: dīptamantrabalaṃ kaṃ cit tasmād anviṣya sādhakam /
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.37_0: ity amātyavacaḥ śrutvā tathety āha mahīpatiḥ /
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.40_1: bhavanaṃ bhogināṃ bhartuḥ sa dadarśa nabhaḥprabham //
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.46_1: badhnāty eṣa na yāvan māṃ tāvad yuktikramaḥ kṣamaḥ //
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.47_1: jāne so 'pi na me sādhu paritrāṇe pragalbhate //
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.48_1: lubdhakaḥ padmako nāma sa me saṃrakṣaṇakṣamaḥ //
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.49_0: iti niścitya manasā sa gatvā lubdhakāntikam /
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.50_1: dhanvī taṃ deśam abhyetya mantradhīraṃ vyalokayat //
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.53_3: rakṣārthanām iva cakāra taraṅgahastasaktāñjali prabalakampavilolam ambhaḥ //
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.60_1: abhyarcyamānaś citreṇa kaṃ cit kālam uvāsa saḥ //
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.61_0: kadā cid atha nāgena pūjyamānaṃ savismayaḥ /
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.62_0: taṃ dṛṣṭvā tatprabhāvaṃ ca śrutvā nāganiveditam /
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.63_1: taṃ jīvitādhikaṃ tasmai dadau prītyā phaṇīśvaraḥ //
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.64_0: tatas taṃ pāśam ādāya citram āmantrya lubdhakaḥ /
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.67_0: tataḥ kadā cit sa muner viśrāntasya sthitaḥ puraḥ /
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.67_1: śuśrāva kākalīgītaṃ kīrṇaṃ karṇarasāyanam // gītaśravaṇaniṣpandanilīnahariṇaṃ vanam /
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.68_0: tataḥ kadā cit sa muner viśrāntasya sthitaḥ puraḥ /
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.68_1: śuśrāva kākalīgītaṃ kīrṇaṃ karṇarasāyanam // gītaśravaṇaniṣpandanilīnahariṇaṃ vanam /
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.68_2: citranyastam ivālokya so 'pṛcchad vismito munim // kamalābandhasaṃruddhamadhupadhvanisodaraḥ /
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.69_0: citranyastam ivālokya so 'pṛcchad vismito munim // kamalābandhasaṃruddhamadhupadhvanisodaraḥ /
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.70_0: iti lubdhakaputreṇa pṛṣṭas taṃ munir abravīt /
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.72_0: śrutvaitat kautukākrāntaḥ sa punar munim abhyadhāt /
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.73_0: tam uvāca munir yasya bhavet pāśaḥ karāgragaḥ /
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.74_0: etad ākarṇya sotsāhas taṃ praṇamyātha lubdhakaḥ /
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.76_0: madbye snānotthitāṃ tāsāṃ sa dadarśa manoharām /
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.82_1: cakre pāśam amoghākhyaṃ sajjaṃ sapadi lubdhakaḥ //
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.83_1: kinnaryo divam utpetuḥ pāśahastaṃ vilokya taṃ //
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.84_1: manoharāṃ sa jagrāha hariṇīm iva lubdhakaḥ //
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.85_0: sā pāśavivaśā tena kṛṣṭā kaṣṭadaśāṃ śritā /
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.86_1: nirīkṣamāṇā kakubhaḥ sā saṃbhrāntā tam abhyadhāt //
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.87_0: muñca muñca dṛḍhākṣiptāṃ mā sprākṣīḥ parirakṣa mām /
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.87_1: krūrā api bhavanty eva śokārtiṣu kṛpālavaḥ //
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.88_1: sadyaḥ pradīptā vidyeva nirdahaty eva sādhakam //
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.89_0: māṃ vicārya dhiyā dhīmann ucitāya prayacchataḥ /
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.90_0: pīḍāṃ pāśakṛtām etāṃ na sahe muñca bandhanam /
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.90_1: svayaṃ vrajāmy ahaṃ tatra yatra te 'bhimatā gatiḥ //
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.91_0: divam utplutya gacchāmi na tv ahaṃ muktabandhanā /
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.91_1: yadvaśān me gatir vyomni cūḍāratnaṃ gṛhāṇa tat //
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.92_0: ity uktaḥ sa tayā sāsraṃ prayātaḥ karuṇārdratām /
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.92_1: cūḍāmaṇiṃ samādāya pāśaṃ muktvā jagāda tām //
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.93_0: samāśvasihi kalyāṇi na śokaṃ kartum arhasi /
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.96_0: sa te samucitaḥ subhru vibhramābharaṇaṃ bhuvaḥ /
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.97_0: sa te samucitaḥ subhru vibhramābharaṇaṃ bhuvaḥ /
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.99_1: prasthitaḥ sudhano dhanvī śanais taṃ deśam āyayau //
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.102_1: harann iva rajaḥpuñjaṃ vyājahāra sa sārathim //
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.108_1: paśyanti dantiśiśavaḥ parito rathaṃ me nemisvanāpaḥrtacāpalalīnakarṇāḥ //
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.110_1: śuśrāva nirjane kīrṇaṃ kinnaryāḥ karuṇaṃ svanam //
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.116_5: sāṃrājye jagatāṃ yayā vijayate devo vilāsāyudhaḥ //
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.118_1: tāṃ pibantam ivābhyetya praṇamya prāha lubdhakaḥ //
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.120_1: tvam evāsyā guṇodāra bhartā bhuva ivocitaḥ //
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.122_0: rakṣyo maṇir ayaṃ nāsti datte 'smin saṃgamo 'nayā /
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.122_1: ity uktvāsmai dadau kanyāratnaṃ ratnaṃ ca lubdhakaḥ //
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.125_0: kinnarīṃ ratham āropya ratnair āpūrya lubdhakam /
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.126_0: sa hastināpuraṃ prāpya nivedya svakathāṃ pituḥ /
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.127_0: sukṛtair bhogyatāṃ yātāṃ mūrtām iva śaśiśriyam /
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.129_1: vailakṣye 'pi sphuṭallakṣmīṃ tasyāḥ prītiṃ tatāna saḥ //
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.139_1: sadā saṃsadi mām eva nayaty eṣa vilakṣatām //
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.141_1: tasmād āśrayam evāsya śrīmūlam praharāmy aham //
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.142_1: yuktaḥ kartuṃ prayatno me mānamlāniṃ kathaṃ sahe //
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.143_1: nāsti tat pātakaṃ loke yan na kurvanti matsarāḥ //
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.144_0: kathaṃ paśyati sadvartma sa sadā vyathitāśayaḥ /
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.144_2: rāgaḥ pāpaṃ paramam adhikaṃ darpapāpaṃ tato 'pi
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.144_3: krodhāt pāpaṃ jagati na paraṃ duḥsahaṃ lobhapāpam /
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.144_4: yāvān eṣa vyasanini jane gaṇyate pāpavargaḥ
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.144_5: pāpāṃśasya spṛśati na tulāṃ so 'pi vidveṣasūteḥ //
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.146_0: tataḥ kadā cin meghākhyaṃ krūraṃ karvaṭavāsinam /
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.148_0: kumāra gamyatāṃ tūrṇam ucchettuṃ tarasā ripum /
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.148_1: kramopapannaṃ sāṃrājyaṃ niḥśalyam idam astu te //
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.151_0: durbalaiḥ kiṃ hatair anyaiḥ sāmantair antavāsibhiḥ /
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.151_1: dṛptaḥ sa eva hantavyas tadvadhe sarvasiddhayaḥ //
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.154_1: jananīṃ svairam abhyetya praṇipatya jagāda saḥ //
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.159_6: dveṣaḥ puṣpaśare sukhe vimukhatā dehe 'pi niḥsnehatā
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.159_8: śayyā bhūmitalaṃ tathāpi sutanos tāpakṣatir nābhavan
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.164_0: dṛṣṭaṃ adya mayā svapne niruddhaṃ śatrubhiḥ puram /
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.166_0: iti pṛṣṭaḥ kṣitīśena kṣaṇam antaḥ purohitaḥ /
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.168_0: priyā manoharā jyeṣṭhaṃ jīvitaṃ tasya kinnarī /
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.168_1: abhāve niyataṃ tasyā na sa jīvati duḥkhitaḥ //
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.170_1: dṛṣṭaḥ spaṣṭaṃ phalaṃ tasya duḥsahaṃ katham ucyate //
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.172_0: rājyāt bhraṃśaḥ śarīrād vā svapnasyāsya phalaṃ sphuṭam /
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.174_1: antaḥpure snuṣā te 'sti kinnarī na tu durlabhā //
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.175_0: iti tasya vacaḥ śrutvā krūraṃ pātakakūṇitaḥ /
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.176_1: kinnarīvirahe 'vaśyaṃ na ca jīvati me sutaḥ //
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.178_0: aho rājan na jānīṣe dhīmān api janasthitim /
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.178_1: trivargasādhanaṃ tyājyam na rājyaṃ na ca jīvitaṃ //
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.179_0: arthā iva svajanamitrakalatraputrā naṣṭāḥ sthitasya puruṣasya punar bhavanti /
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.179_1: ucchvāsamātravirahe gatajīvitasya tatkālasaṃnihitam apy asad eva sarvam //
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.180_1: jīvitād aparaṃ rājañ jīvaloke 'sti na priyam //
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.186_1: snuṣāpi hanyate rājñā tat kiṃ vakṣyāmy ahaṃ sutam //
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.187_0: mātas tvayeyaṃ vātsalyāt pālyā mama manoharā /
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.187_1: ity uktvā sudhanaḥ sūnur gato nikṣipya me vadhūm //
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.188_0: tasmāc cūḍāmaṇim mattaḥ prāpya vyomnā prayātu sā /
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.188_1: bhaviṣyati tayā patyur jīvantyā saṃgamaḥ punaḥ //
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.189_0: iti saṃcintya sā gatvā sāśrunetrā snuṣāntikam /
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.190_0: vatse cūḍāmaṇiṃ baddhvā gaccha tūrṇaṃ vihāyasā /
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.191_1: anyathā tvām asau vetti gūḍhanyastāṃ mayā kva cit //
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.193_0: śvaśrvā dattaṃ samādāya baddhvā mūrdhni śikhāmaṇim /
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.193_2: rājan naitat tava samucitaṃ yat priyasyāpi sūnor
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.193_3: vadhyā patnī nijapadam iyaṃ svasti tubhyaṃ gatāham /
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.195_1: purohitas tam avadad deva mā saṃśayaṃ kṛthāḥ //
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.196_1: nirvighnas te kratuḥ siddhaḥ sā hatā tena kinnarī //
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.197_0: iti mithyāvacas tasya rājā satyam amanyata /
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.204_1: tvam eva brūhi bhagavan yadi yuktam idaṃ kṛtam //
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.205_1: tām uvāca munir mugdhe tavaiṣā bhavitavyatā //
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.206_1: upalabhya kathāṃ dhūrtas tvāṃ babandha sa lubdhakaḥ //
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.208_0: ity uktā muninā tanvī praṇayāt tam abhāṣata /
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.209_0: idaṃ tu bhavatām agre yan mayā kiṃ cid ucyate /
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.214_0: tad idaṃ bhavatā vācyaṃ kāruṇyād vacasā mama /
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.215_0: utkaṇṭhām anukampāṃ vā sahajāṃ vā kṛtajñatām /
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.215_1: dākṣiṇyaṃ vā puraskṛtya tūrṇam āgamyatām itaḥ //
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.217_1: dṛśyate haviṣā paktvā pātavyā sā svayaṃ tvayā //
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.219_1: ity uktvā viṣamaṃ vartma kathayitvā krameṇa sā //
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.225_1: pitur antaḥpuraṃ dṛṣṭvā sa vipriyam aśaṅkata //
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.226_0: api jīvati sā tanvī virahārtā manoharā /
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.226_1: iti bruvāṇaṃ na yadā tam ūce kaś cid apriyam //
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.227_0: tadā jagāda jananī putra jīvati te priyā /
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.227_1: gatā cūḍāmaṇiṃ prāpya kiṃ tu jīvitasaṃśaye //
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.228_0: iti śrutvaiva sahasā sa papāta mahītale /
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.228_1: kīrṇahāralatāṃ kurvan sāśrudhārām iva kṣitim // tuṣāraśīkarasmeraharicandanavāribhiḥ /
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.229_0: iti śrutvaiva sahasā sa papāta mahītale /
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.229_1: kīrṇahāralatāṃ kurvan sāśrudhārām iva kṣitim // tuṣāraśīkarasmeraharicandanavāribhiḥ /
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.231_1: vihitā na dhṛtir mayā mṛgākṣyās tad ayaṃ me patitaḥ smarābhiśāpaḥ //
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.232_0: dehi prativacaḥ subhru kva gatāsi manohare /
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.235_1: gatvā vanāntaṃ babhrāma sameṣu viṣameṣu ca //
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.237_2: brūhi sakhe śukaśāvaka sakhyuḥ prāṇasakhīṃ nikhilendumukhīṃ tām /
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.239_1: diśan prakāśaṃ dayayeva mārge śanair jagāhe gaganaṃ sitāṃśuḥ //
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.240_0: śyāmāpater manmathabāndhavasya kāntaṃ sa dṛṣṭvāmbaracumbi bimbam /
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.240_1: saṃdarśitaṃ sasmitam indumukhyā mene mukhaṃ vyomavimānaśrṅgāt //
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.241_1: cireṇa niścitya śaśāṅkam eva papraccha gacchan naranāthasūnuḥ //
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.242_0: api tvayā kāntisakhī sakhe khe tulyekṣaṇā lakṣmaṃrgasya dṛṣṭā /
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.243_0: api tvayā kāntisakhī sakhe khe tulyekṣaṇā lakṣmaṃrgasya dṛṣṭā /
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.243_2: kathaṃ na kiṃ cit kathayaty ayaṃ me gatasya kāntākathanārthibhāvam /
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.244_0: api tvayā snigdhataḍitprakāśā ghanastanī kvāpi mayūra dṛṣṭā /
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.244_1: tvadbarhabhārasya suhṛt sa yasyā vicitramālyaḥ kabarīkalāpaḥ //
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.245_0: bhujaṃga kac cid bhavatā bhujaṃgī dṛṣṭā kva cit sā vararatnacūḍā /
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.245_1: viṣacchaṭāḥ paśya yayā visṛṣṭā māṃ duḥsahe 'smin virahe dahanti //
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.246_0: sāraṅga sā raṅgavilāsinī kiṃ dṛṣṭā tvayā manmathapārthivasya /
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.246_1: yasyāḥ kaṭākṣotpalasaṃvibhāgair vibhānti manye gahane hariṇyaḥ //
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.247_1: līlāvilolā lalanā vanānte lateva dṛṣṭā stabakāvanaṃrā //
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.248_0: anena nūnaṃ vanakuñjareṇa sā rājarambhā parirambhalobhāt /
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.248_1: ākṛṣya nītā ghanasaṃnibhena saṃcchāditā vā śaśinaḥ kaleva //
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.251_1: api śamitaśaśāṅkoddāmasaundaryadarpā munivara hariṇākṣī kinnarī kāpi dṛṣṭā //
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.252_1: muniḥ śrutvā vacas tasya parijñāya tam abravīt //
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.253_1: dṛṣṭā sā tava kalyāṇī mayā mānasacandrikā //
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.254_5: tasyā naiva kva cid api manaḥ kiṃ tu viśrāntim eti //
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.256_1: āgantavyaṃ tvayā tūrṇam iti tvāṃ saṃdideśa sā //
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.257_1: agamye kinnarapure kramād vartma śaśaṃsa ca //
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.258_0: idaṃ ca tvatkṛte dattaṃ tayā ratnāṅgulīyakam /
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.259_1: aṅgulīyaṃ dadau tasmai mārgaṃ cākathayan muniḥ //
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.264_1: vāyuvegākhyam āruhya sa taṃ śailam alaṅghayat //
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.271_0: mṛgacarma samutsṛjya tāṃ nihatya sa vīryavān /
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.272_0: mṛgacarma samutsṛjya tāṃ nihatya sa vīryavān /
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.272_2: praviśya tadguhāṃ lebhe śilāṃ vyasya mahauṣadhim / śītātapatamaḥsarparākṣasādibhayāpahām //
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.277_1: rodinīṃ ca nadīṃ tīre yasyāḥ kinnaraceṭikāḥ //
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.279_1: laṅghayitvāpagāś cānyā vetrāṃ prāpya nadīṃ tataḥ //
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.282_0: praviśya sa śanaiḥ prapya kāntāṃ kanakapadminīm /
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.284_1: hastālambena sāhāyyaṃ kṛtvā papraccha tārn śanaiḥ //
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.285_0: mātaḥ kasya kṛte toyaṃ idaṃ yatnena nīyate /
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.286_0: iti tena priyagirā sā pṛṣṭā tam abhāṣata /
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.288_0: tayeti kathitaṃ śrutvā sudhāsikta iva kṣaṇāt /
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.289_0: snāntyās tatas tad abhihāri manoharāyāḥ kumbhāt papāta kucakumbhayuge 'ṅgulīyam /
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.289_4: sā kāntam āgatam avetya kutas tvayedaṃ
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.291_0: tatas tām avadad dāsī devi puṣkariṇītaṭe /
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.291_1: sthitaḥ ko 'pi yuvā kāntaḥ pratyakṣa iva manmathaḥ //
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.293_0: iti tadvacanaṃ tanvī priyaṃ śrutvā manoharā /
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.293_1: niścitya dayitaṃ prāptam ānināya tayaiva tam //
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.295_1: tayoḥ praharṣānubhavena lebhe śobhām aśeṣāṅgavatīm anaṅgaḥ //
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.295_2: yad yat kiṃ cid virahasamaye cintayābhyastam antar
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.295_4: yad yat premṇaḥ sadṛśam ucitaṃ yad yad autsukyarāśes
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.295_5: tat tat sarvaṃ praṇayasubhagaṃ dampatī cakratus tau //
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.300_1: bata prayātam etat te martyasnehena śocyatāṃ //
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.302_1: malinā khalavidyeva saṃmatāsi na kasya cit //
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.303_0: rūpamātreṇa tuṣṭā tvaṃ yadi martyavaśaṃ gatā /
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.307_0: iti sā bhartsitā pitrā tam uvāca natānanā /
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.308_0: kopād anucitaṃ tāta naitan māṃ vaktum arhasi /
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.308_1: na śrūyante prabhāveṇa kiṃ narāḥ kinnarādhikāḥ //
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.309_0: garuḍasyāpi durlaṅghyām imām ullaṅghya yaḥ kṣitim /
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.309_1: prabhāvabhūmir āyāti manuṣyaḥ sa kathaṃ bhavet //
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.310_1: karoty ānanda saṃvādaṃ dyutir eva himatviṣaḥ //
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.311_0: jātyā kiṃ kriyate tāta svabhāvānuguṇā guṇāḥ /
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.312_0: bhavanty antarguṇāḥ ke cic channadoṣās tathāpare /
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.313_0: śrutvaitat kinnarapatis tat tatheti vicintya ca /
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.314_0: tvayā kāntyā jitās tāvad ete kinnaradārakāḥ /
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.315_1: vyuptam anyūnam uccitya punar dehi tilādhakam //
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.317_0: ity aśakye 'pi kauṭilyāt preritas tena karmaṇi /
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.325_1: punas tadvañcanāyaiva tāṃ tāṃ yuktim acintayat //
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.327_0: sa tam ūce prabhāvo 'yaṃ divyaḥ prakaṭitas tvayā /
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.329_0: ity uktas tena sa punaḥ kinnarīśatapañcakam /
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.330_0: tāsāṃ madhye parijñāya sa jagrāha manoharām /
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.331_0: devo 'yam iti niścitya tatas taṃ kinnareśvaraḥ /
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.331_1: tuṣṭas tasmai dadau divyaratnaiḥ saha manoharām //
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.332_1: jāyāsakhas tam āmantrya kumāraḥ svapuraṃ yayau //
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.334_0: putraṃ tataś caritacandrasitātapatre rājye 'bhiṣicya paritāpaharaṃ prajānāṃ /
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.335_0: putraṃ tataś caritacandrasitātapatre rājye 'bhiṣicya paritāpaharaṃ prajānāṃ /
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.335_2: prāptābhiṣekaṃ sudhanam prabhāte taṃ saptaratnāni pṛthupratāpam /
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.336_0: sa bodhisattvaḥ sudhano 'ham eva yaśodharā sāpi manoharābhūt
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.338_0: iti bhikṣugaṇaḥ svayaṃ jinena svakathāṃ tāṃ viniveditāṃ niśamya /
S01kbavk64u:kavk_64.338_1: sarasaṃ pṛthumūlam eva mene śataśākhasya manobhavam bhavasya //
S01kbavk64u:1_0: iti kṣemendraviracitāyāṃ bodhisattvāvadānakalpalatāyāṃ sudhanakinnaryavadānaṃ catuḥṣaṣṭitamaḥ pallavaḥ
